title: DATABASES and SCHEMATA views, and SHOW DATABASES and SHOW SCHEMAS commands: New column in output (Pending) | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_08 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

When this behavior change bundle is enabled, a new column, OBJECT_VISIBILITY, will be added to the following
ACCOUNT_USAGE views:

OBJECT_VISIBILITY will also be available in the output of the SHOW DATABASES and
SHOW SCHEMAS commands.
The new column is appended to the existing views and is reserved for future use.
